game

Class ZombieCorpse

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
      • game.PortableItem
        • game.ZombieCorpse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ItemInterface

    public class ZombieCorpse
extends PortableItem
    An Item subclass which represents a corpse Item when an Actor is killed by a Zombie. Turns into a Zombie within 5-10 turns.
    Author:
    Daniel Yuen

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZombieCorpse

        public ZombieCorpse(java.lang.String name)
        Constructor. Sets the conversionCounter for each instance of ZombieCorpse to a random integer between 5-10.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the human that is killed

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Location location)
        Tick method for when the corpse is on the ground. Removes the ZombieCorpse and adds a new Zombie in the location after conversionCounter reaches 0.
        Overrides:
        tick in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the ground on which we lie.

      • tick

        public void tick(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Location location,
                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
        Tick method for when the corpse is being carried. Removes the ZombieCorpse from the inventory of the Actor carrying the corpse and adds a new Zombie in a random location adjacent to the Actor after conversionCounter reaches 0.
        Overrides:
        tick in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the actor carrying this Item.
        actor - The actor carrying this Item.
